text: Sonequa Chaunt√© Martin-Green (; born March 21, 1985) is an American actress and producer. She is best known for her television roles as Michael Burnham in Star Trek: Discovery, and as Sasha Williams on The Walking Dead. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:African- American movie actors Category:African-American stage actors Category:African- American television actors Category:African-American voice actors Category:Actors from Alabama Category:American video game actors
title: Sonequa Martin-Green
